txt.en: 'The raiders who stole our supplies are without fear, it seems. If we do not teach them the meaning of fear, they are bound to be back... and in greater force.\n\n'Perhaps you could hunt down the raiders who attacked our camp. They scattered into the hills somewhere just west of here, no doubt waiting for their next chance to strike.'
'Driven off? I wager that they will be back, but maybe they will not be so brazen the next time.\n\n'Anyway, I should thank you for your help.'
The Rohirrim quartermaster at the Ford of Isen is incensed by the brazen Dunlending raid upon his stores in the night.

The Dunlending raiders were last seen scattering into the hills west of the Ford of Isen.\n\nThe Rohirrim quartermaster asked you to hunt down the Dunlending raiders who attacked the encampment and chase them from the area.
The Rohirrim quartermaster is at the Ford of Isen.\n\nYou should return to the Rohirrim quartermaster and tell him that the Dunlending raiders have been driven off.
